rows.label: tev006211_MSG0010
rows.name:
We are honored friends now, you and we.
Yet some continue to shun us, tainted as
we are by association with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006211_MSG0020
rows.name:
All the more reason, then, for me to join
humanity's vanguard and prove once and
for all the value Wrothians put on honor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006211_SEL0040
rows.name: Add Ga Jiarg to your team.

rows.label: tev006211_MSG0050
rows.name: Very well. Wherever you go, I shall follow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006211_SEL0070
rows.name: Decline Ga Jiarg's request for now.

rows.label: tev006211_MSG0080
rows.name:
Understood. I remain in readiness for
battle, but will await your command.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006211_MSG0090
rows.name:
I am aware of the stakes. The lives of all
who inhabit Mira hang in the balance,
their survival contingent on our victory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006211_MSG0100
rows.name:
We are no different from you in that
regard, and I am ready to do my part,
should you have need of my martial ability.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006211_SEL0120
rows.name: Add Ga Jiarg to your team.

rows.label: tev006211_MSG0130
rows.name:
I hear and follow.
From now on, my sword is yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006211_MSG0150
rows.name: Decline Ga Jiarg's request for now.

rows.label: tev006211_MSG0160
rows.name:
Regrettable, but so be it.
Fight well, my friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006211_MSG0170
rows.name:
Answering your people's call,
I too have been summoned to
embark on this mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev006211_MSG0180
rows.name:
The White Whale 2 shall be safe under
Buidhe's protection. On Wrothian honor,
I swear she will let no harm befall it.[ST:wait ]
